thread.title: Quick visit to Manhattan - NYC
thread.title_full: Quick visit to Manhattan - NYC - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Cindy E
title: Quick visit to Manhattan - NYC
text:
We were in NYC for a family visit and had just one day to see a few sights. We had tickets for the 911 Memorial & Museum and wanted to be somewhere close given the traffic. This hotel was perfect for that - the location was great! We walked to a Soho restaurant for dinner and were able to walk to and from the Memorial the following morning (15-20 mins). The evening and morning hotel staff were all very pleasant and accommodating - giving us ample late checkout time. The bar was nice for a nightcap and the bartender engaging.
Room Tip: Ask for a room on a high floor See more room tips
